author: drax911sc

comments.content: Nalle = David Nalle of Scriptorium. This font is called [Maginot](http://web.archive.org/web/20080612044126/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/scriptorium/maginot/) by Nalle, following up Stephen’s hint out of boredom. :^)

Thanks, this forum never ceases to impress.

Joe
